{{For|the Atarra meteorite of 1920|Meteorite falls}} {{Use dmy dates|date=April 2018}} {{Use Indian English|date=April 2018}} <!-- See [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Indian cities]] for details -->{{Infobox settlement | name = Atarra | native_name = | anjali fashion point = | other_name = | nickname = | settlement_type = Town | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | pushpin_map = India Uttar Pradesh#India | pushpin_label_position = right | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Uttar Pradesh, India | coordinates = {{coord|25.28|N|80.57|E|display=inline,title}} | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{flag|India}} | subdivision_type1 = [[States and territories of India|State]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Uttar Pradesh]] | subdivision_type2 = [[List of districts of India|District]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Banda district (India)|Banda]] | established_title = <!-- Established --> | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | government_type = | governing_body = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_rank = | area_total_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 124 | population_total = 47419 | population_as_of = 2011 | population_rank = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_footnotes = | demographics_type1 = Languages | demographics1_title1 = Official | demographics1_info1 = [[Hindi language|Hindi]] | timezone1 = [[Indian Standard Time|IST]] | utc_offset1 = +5:30 | postal_code_type = <!-- [[Postal Index Number|PIN]] --> | postal_code = 210201 | registration_plate = UP-90 | municipality website = {{URL|www.atarramunicipal.com}} | website = {{URL|atarramunicipal.com}} | footnotes = }}
'''Atarra''' is a town and a [[municipal board]] in [[Banda district (India)|Banda district]] in the state of [[Uttar Pradesh]], [[India]]. It is located at a distance of 35 km from [[Banda, Uttar Pradesh|Banda]]. The town is divided into 25 wards.<ref name = population/>
==Geography==
Atarra is located at {{Coord|25.28|N|80.57|E|}}<ref>[http://www.fallingrain.com/world/IN/36/Atarra.html Falling Rain Genomics, Inc – Atarra]</ref> and has an average elevation of {{Convert|124|m|ft|abbr=on}}. It lies on the [[Indo-Gangetic Plain]]. '''Nahar Canal''' passes nearby the town.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://atarra.uponline.in/city-guide/about-atarra|title=About Atarra|accessdate=2 November 2017}}</ref>
== Demographics ==
{{As of|2011}} [[Census of India|census]], the town had a population of 47,419 in 8,618 Households. The total population constitute, 25,098 males and 22,321 females with a sex ratio of 983 females per 1000 males. 4,533 children are in the age group of 0–6 years, of which 2,325 are boys and 2,208 are girls with a sex ratio of 889. The average literacy rate stands at 78.59 % with 32,215 literates of which, males were 18,996 while females were 13,219 and 15,204 Illiterates.<ref name=population>{{cite web|url=http://www.census2011.co.in/data/town/801056-atarra.html|title=Atarra Census 2011|accessdate=2 November 2017}}</ref>
Schedule Caste are with a population of 10,445 whereas Schedule Tribe had a population of 80.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.censusindia.co.in/towns/atarra-population-banda-uttar-pradesh-801056|title=Atarra Censusindia.in|accessdate=2 November 2017}}</ref>
=== Work Profile ===
As per the report published by Census India in 2011, 14,367 people were engaged in work activities out of the total population of Atarra which includes 15,110 males and 5,461 females.
According to census survey report 2011, 11,939 workers describe their work as main work, 1,447 as Cultivators, 1,092 persons work as Agricultural labourers. 630 are working in Household industry and 8,770 are involved in other works. Of them 2,428 are Marginal workers.<ref name=population />
== Transportation == State run [[Uttar Pradesh State Road Transport Corporation]] bus services from Atarra to various parts of the state. Atarra falls under [[Chitrakoot division]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.upsrtc.com/default.aspx?depots---bus-stations|title=Depots & Bus Stations|accessdate=2 November 2017}}</ref> [[Atarra railway station]] serves the city. It has 2 [[Railway platform|Platforms]] and is located in North-Eastern part of the city.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://indiarailinfo.com/station/map/482?|title=ATE/Atarra (2 PFs) Indianrailinfo|accessdate=2 November 2017}}</ref>
